description: List of key/value parameters of an error

locale.description: The locale for language display, date format, etc., for example 'en-US' or 'sv' or 'es-419'

currency.description: Primary currency, for example USD, EUR, INR

timezone.description: The time zone when showing date time information, for example 'UTC', 'America/New_York'

numberingSystem.description: The system used for numeral display, either latn or arab
